Package element.Static

Class Bomb

java.lang.Object
element.Element
element.Static.StaticElement
element.Static.Bomb
All Implemented Interfaces:
ElementInterface
public class Bomb extends StaticElement
Class responsible for creating the bomb element. Extension of the static element class.
Author:
Eduardo Correia, Jose Carvalho, Alberto Serra

  • Constructor Details

    • Bomb

      public Bomb​(PositionInterface position, String color, com.googlecode.lanterna.SGR format, String character, int radius)
      Constructor for the bomb class
      Parameters:
      position - Position to generate the bomb on
      color - color of the bomb
      format - SGR format
      character - character to represent the bomb
      radius - radius of the explosion

  • Method Details

    • getInterval

      public int getInterval()
      Gets the interval at which the bomb flashes
      Returns:
      integer corresponding to the interval

    • getRadius

      public int getRadius()
      Gets the radius the of the bomb
      Returns:
      returns integer value corresponding to radius of the bomb

    • bombTick

      public void bombTick()
      Ticks the bomb's timer by 1, also checks to see if a flashing interval has been reached and alternates colour accordingly.

    • alternateColour

      private void alternateColour()
      Alternates the bomb's colour between colour 1 and colour 2

    • getTimer

      public int getTimer()
      Gets the current bomb timer
      Returns:
      integer corresponding to the bomb timer

    • explode

      public void explode​(MazeInterface maze)
      Function used to destroy tiles in a radius around the bomb.
      Parameters:
      maze - maze class in which to explode the bomb

    • destroy

      public void destroy​(List<StaticElement> list, PositionInterface position, int radius)
      Recursive function that destroys tiles in a cross shaped pattern until the radius variable reaches 0
      Parameters:
      list - list which contains the tiles to be destroyed
      position - position to destroy
      radius - radius variable, ends recursive loop when 0
